segments.text: Have you got any experience in advertising ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have been working in the Public Relations Section of a company in the past two years . I plan the advertising campaign and cooperate the work of artists and typographers . Sometimes I have to do the work of a specialist when there â€™ s something urgent .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any practical experience as a secretary ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir . I acted as a secretary in an insurance company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you tell me the essential qualities a secretary should maintain ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , to begin with , I would say she needs to be diligent , and the second point is that she has to do a lot of things on her own initiative . Finally , she can make notes in shorthand and types and has the skills in report writing , summary writing , keep minutes at meetings , and so on . Most important of all is that she seems to have a better memory than average .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you had any experience with computer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I studied in a computer training program , and can process data through the computer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's fine . What about operating the fax and duplicator ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can handle them without any trouble
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What have you learned from jobs you have held ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Above all , I have learned that what is good for the company is good for me . So I follow the instructions strictly and always keep my boss informed .
segments.speaker: S2
